355a5(mdo sde): grong gcig gnas mod kyi// de dag phan tshun rnam par mi shes so// mig gi dbang po gzugs gyur rnams la rgyu ga/ rna ba'i dbang po sgra la rnam par spyod// sna'i dbang
355a6(mdo sde): po sna tshogs dri rnams 'phrog/ lce'i dbang po rtag tu ro la rgyug/ lus kyi dbang po rog pa dag la rgyug/ yid kyi dbang po chos rnams rnam par spyod// dbang po drug po 'di dag phan tshun du// 
355a7(mdo sde): rang rang yul du rab tu 'jug par byed// sems ni sgyu ma bzhin du g.yo ba yin// dbang po drug ni yul la rnam par spyod// ji ltar mi zhig grong stong rgyug pa dang // dmag dang chom
355a8(mdo sde): rkun dag dang gnas pa bzhin// ji ltar sems ni yul drug gnas bcas shing // dbang po'i spyod yul dag kyang rab tu shes// de ltar sems ni yul drug gnas bcas te/ 
355b1(mdo sde): dbang po'i spyod yul rnams kyang rab shes te// gzugs dang sgra dang de bzhin dri rnams dang // ro dang reg bya de bzhin spyod yul chos// sems ni dbang po drug po thams cad la// dbang por zhugs
355b2(mdo sde): pa bya bzhin g.yo bar gyur// dbang po gang dang gang du gnas bcas pa// dbang po de ni shes par bdag nyid byed// lus ni g.yo ba med cing byed pa med// snying po med cing
355b3(mdo sde): rkyen las byung ba yin// yang dag ma yin yongs su rtog las byung // grong stong las kyi 'khrul 'khor 'dra ba gnas// sa dang me dang chu dang rlung rnams ni// grong gzhan
355b4(mdo sde): gnas te phyogs dang phyogs na gnas// dper na sprul gdug gnas gcig ji bzhin te// rtag tu phan tshun 'thun pa ma yin bzhin// khams kyi sprul
355b5(mdo sde): rnams bzhi po de dag kyang // gnyis ni steng 'gro gnyis ni thur du 'gro/ phyogs dang phyogs mtshams// rnams su gnyis gnyis te// khams sprul de dgu
355b6(mdo sde): thams cad 'jig par 'gyur// sa'i sbrul dang chu'i sbrul dag dang // 'di gnyis 'og tu zad par 'gyur ba yin// me'i sbrul dang rlung gi sbrul dag dang // 'di gnyis steng / 
355b7(mdo sde): gi nam mkhar 'gro ba yin// ji lta sngon chad byas pa'i las rnams kyis// sems dang rnam shes kun tu gnas nas dong // lha dang mi dang ngan song gsum dag tu// ji ltar
355b8(mdo sde): byas pa'i las kyis srid par skye// bad kan rlung dang mkhris pa zad gyur na// lus shi gcin dang ngan skyugs rnams kyis gang // mngon par mi dga' srin bu'i phung por
356a1(mdo sde): gyur dur khrod dag na mtho ba shing bzhin gyur// lha mo khyod ni chos 'di rnams la ltos// 'di la sems can de bzhin gang zag dang // chos rnams
356a2(mdo sde): 'di dag thams cad stong pa ste// ma rig pa'i rkyen las byung ba yin// 'byung ba chen po 'di dag che 'byung min// ma byung ba las byung zhing mi 'byung te// gang gi phyir ni 'byung ba
356a3(mdo sde): mi 'byung ba// de phyir 'byung ba che zhes ngas brjod do// ma rig pa ni gzhar yang yod min la// ma rig pa'i rkyen las byung ba yin// ma rig pa 'di yod pa ma yin te// de bas
356a4(mdo sde): ngas ni ma rig 'di bshad do// 'du byed rnam shes ming dang / gzugs bcas dang // skye mched drug dang reg dang tshor ba dang // sred dang len dang de bzhin srid pa dang / 
356a5(mdo sde): skye dang rga shi mya ngan gnod pa rnamaso// 'khor ba'i sdugabasngal bsam gyis mi khyab pa// 'khor ba'i'akhor lo ji ltar gnas pa dag/ ma byung ba las
356a6(mdo sde): byung dang mi 'byung dang // tshul bzhin ma yin sems kyis rnam dpyad dang // bdag gis lta bar gyur pa gcad par gyis// ye shes ral gris nyon mongs rgya mo drol// phung po
356a7(mdo sde): gnas la stong par gyur pa ltos// byang chub yon tan rgya chen reg par gyis// ngas ni bdud rtsi'i grong khyer sgo yang phye// bdud rtsi'i khu ba'i snod kyang kun tu bstan// ngan
356a8(mdo sde): bdud rtsi'i grong khyer gnas der 'jug/ ngan bdud rtsi'i khu bas bdag tshim bya// ngas ni chos kyi rnga chen dam pa brdungs// ngas ni chos kyi dung gi mchog kyang bus// ngas ni
356b1(mdo sde): chos kyi sgron ma mchog 'bar byas// ngas ni chos kyi char pa dam pa phab// nga ni nyon mongs dgra mchog rnams las rgyal// ngas ni chos kyi rgyal mtshan dam pa bsgreng // srid pa'i mtsho las
356b2(mdo sde): sems can rab tu bsgral// ngas ni ngan song gsum gyi lam rnams bkag/ sems can nyon mongs ma yis gdungs gyur pa// rten med gyur cing dpung gnyen med pa dag/ srog
356b3(mdo sde): chags nyon mongs sems gdungs zhi byas nas// bdud rtsi'i khu ba bsil bar tshim par byas// gang phyir bskal bdu ma sngon chad ngas// 'dren pa bsam gyis mi khyab mchod
356b4(mdo sde): pa byas// chos kyi sku de yongs su tshol ba na// rtul zhug/ sa brtan pas byang chub phyir spyad de// lag pa dang ni mig dang rkang pa dang // yan lag mchog dang bu
356b5(mdo sde): sdug bu mo dang // nor dbyigs nor bu mu tig rgyan dang gser// bai DUR+Ya dang rin chen sna tshogs bta/ ba// stong gsum shing ljon thams cad dang // 
356b6(mdo sde): dang rtsa rnams thams cad dang // nags rtsal dag dang sa las ni// 'khrungs pa thams cad bcing gtubs te// de dag thams cad phyir blags nas// rab tu phra ba'i
356b7(mdo sde): rdul 'drar byas// nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor ji tsam par// phye ma'i phung po spangs nas ni// 'di la cha gsum dbye bar nus// sa la rdul ni yod pa rnams// 
356b8(mdo sde): stong gsum dag ni thams cad kyi// rdul khams bsam gyis mi khyab pa// sems can kun gyi shes pa gang // de ni sems can gcig gir gyur// shes pa de yis/ 
357a1(mdo sde): rdul rnams kyi// phye ma bgrang bar byed na ni// sems can kun las rab 'phags pa// ye shes rab ldan mi rnams kyis// thams cad bgrang bar nus
357a2(mdo sde): srid kyis// rgyal ba'i mkhyen la mi nus so// thub pa chen po'i ye shes gang // skad cig gcig la 'jug pa yang // bskal pa bye ba du mar ni// gang du'ang bgrang bar mi nus so// 
357a3(mdo sde): gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las// stong pa nyid kyi le'u zhes bya ste drug pa'o// // de nas rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu dang / 
357a4(mdo sde): rgyal po chen po yul 'khor bsrung dang / rgyal po chen da po 'phags skyes po dang / rgyal po chen po mig da mi bzang stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig la
357a5(mdo sde): bgos nas/ pus mos g.yas pa'i lha ngas la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la
357a6(mdo sde): 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsungs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa
357a7(mdo sde): thams cad kyis gzigs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis dgongs pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs thams cad kyis yongs su bzung ba/ lha'i tshogs thams
357a8(mdo sde): cad kyis phyag bgyis pa/ lha'i tshogs thams cad kyis mchod pa/ lha'i dbang po'i tshogs thams cad kyis mngon par bstod pa/ 'jig rten skyong ba thams cad kyis
357b1(mdo sde): mchod cing bsngags te/ brjod nas rab tu bkur ba/ lha'i khang khyim thams cad snang bar bgyid pa/ sems can thams cad mchog tu bde ba rab tu sbyin par bgyid pa/ sems
357b2(mdo sde): can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi sdug bsngal thams cad skems pa/ 'jigs pa thams cad kyi rgyun gcod pa/ pha rol gyi dmigs tshogs
357b3(mdo sde): thams cad rab tu bzlog pa/ mu ge'i dgon pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyid pa/ nad kyi dgon pa thams cad zhi bar bgyid pa/ gza' thams cad sel ba/ mya ngan dang nyon mongs
357b4(mdo sde): pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyid pa/ gnod pa rnam dpa sna tshogs rab tu zhi bar bgyid pa/ gnod pa da brgya stong rab tu 'joms par bgyid pa lags so// 
357b5(mdo sde): btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di/ 'khor gyi nang du rgya cher yangadag par bshad na/ chos nyan pa chos bdud rtsi'i khu ba
357b6(mdo sde): 'dis/ bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi dpung dang g.yog dang bcas pa bzhi lha'i lus 'di gzi brjid chen pos rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur ro// bdag cag gis lus la brtson pa
357b7(mdo sde): dang stobs dang mthu yang bskyed par 'gyur/ gzi brjid dang dpal dang phun sum tshogs pa yang / bdag gi lus la 'jug par 'gyur ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag
357b8(mdo sde): rgyal po chen po bzhi ni chos dang ldan pa/ chos smra ba/ chos kyi rgyal po lags te/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag ni chos kyis lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin
358a1(mdo sde): dang nam mkha' lding dang / dri za dang mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po rnams kyi rgyal po bgyi'o// 'byung po'i tshogs mi bzad pa snying rje ma mchis pa/ gzhan
358a2(mdo sde): gyi mdangs 'phrog pa rnams bzlog par bgyi'o// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po bzhi/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang / gnod sbyin brgya stong phrag du ma
358a3(mdo sde): dang lhan cig tu/ rtag par rgyun tu lha'i mig rnam par dag pa/ mi'i las 'das pas 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad la blta bar bgyi/ bsrung bar bgyi/ yongs su bskyang bar bgyi ste/ 
358a4(mdo sde): btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de'i slad du bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi 'jig rten skyong zhes ming du chagaso// / btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gang su dag 'dzam bu'i gling
358a5(mdo sde): 'dir pha rol gyi dmigs tshogs kyis yul 'joms par 'gyur ram/ mu ge'i dgon pa 'am/ nad kyi dgonapa 'am/ gnod pa sna tshogs brgya dang / gnod pa stong dang
358a6(mdo sde): gnod pa brgya phrag stong gis brtses par 'gyur ba na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhis/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di 'dzin pa'i
358a7(mdo sde): dge slong chos smra ba de dag la bskul bar bgyi'o// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das nam bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhis rdzu 'phrul dang byin gyis brlabs kyis/ dge slong chos smra ba de
358a8(mdo sde): dag bskul ba na/ yul gang dang gang du mchi bar/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di yul de dang de dag du rgya char yang dag par ston par 'gyur te/ gang gnod pa sna
358b1(mdo sde): tshogs brgya dang / gnod pa stong yul du 'byung ba 'di lta bu 'di dag rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das mi'i rgyal po gang gi yul du mdo sde'i dbang po 'dzin pa'i dge slong chos smra ba de
358b2(mdo sde): dag mchi bar 'gyur ba'i yul de dag tu gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di yang bsnyen par 'gyur ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das mo'i rgyal pos gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i
358b3(mdo sde): dbang po'i rgyal po 'di mnyan te/ thos nas mdo sde'i dbang po 'dzin pa'i dge slong de dag/ phyir rgol ba thams cad las/ kun tu bsrung bar bgyid/ yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs
358b4(mdo sde): su 'dzin pa dang / yongs su skyong bar bgyid na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po bzhis mi'i rgyal po de'i yul thams cad na gnas pa'i sems can rnams
358b5(mdo sde): kun tu bsrung bar bgyi/ yongs su bskyab pa dngayongs su gzung ba dang / yongs su sbyang ba dang / chad pa spang ba dang / zhi ba dang bde legs su 'gyur bar
358b6(mdo sde): bgyi'o// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das mi'i rgyal pos nam dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge snyen ma mdo sde'i dbang po 'dzin pa la bde bar sbyar
358b7(mdo sde): ba thams cad kyis bde bar bgyid na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhis mi'i rgyal po de'i yul thams cad na gnas pa'i sems can rnams la
358b8(mdo sde): bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis bde ba dang / yo byad thams cad phun sum tshogs par bgyi'o// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das nam mi'i rgyal pos/ dge slong ngam
359a1(mdo sde): dge slong ma 'am/ dge snyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma mdo sde'i dbang po 'dzin padag la sti stang bgyid/ bla mar bgyid/ rim gror bgyid cing mchod na
359a2(mdo sde): btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhis mi'i rgyal po de la/ rgyal po thams cad pas ches sti stang du bgyi/ ches bla mar bgyi/ ches rim gror bgyi/ ches
359a3(mdo sde): mchod par bgyi ste/ yul thams cad du yang rab tu bsngags par bgyi'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis te/ rgyal po chen po bzhi la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ rgyal po
359a4(mdo sde): chen po dag legs so legs so// rgyal po chen po khyed yang legs so// legs so// 'di ltad ste khyed ni sngon gyi rgyal ba la lhag par bya ba byas pa dge ba'i
359a5(mdo sde): rtsa ba rnams bskyed pa/ sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag mang po la bsnyen bkur byas la/ chos dang ldan pa/ chos smra ba/ chos kyi rgyal po chos kyis lha
359a6(mdo sde): dang / mi rnams kyis rgyal po byed pa'o// 'di lta ste khyed ni yun ring por sems can thams cad la phan pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ bde ba dang byams pa'i sems dang ldan pa
359a7(mdo sde): sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba bya ba'i lhag pa'i bsam pa la zhugs pa mi phan pa thams cad 'gog pa sems can thams cad la bde ba thams cad nye bar bsgrub
359a8(mdo sde): par brtson pa yin te/ rgyal po chen po khyed bzhis mi'i rgyal po gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di la mchod pa dang / rim gro byed par brtson pa de dag la kun tu
359b1(mdo sde): srung ba gyis shig/ yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su bzung ba dang / yongs su bskyangs pa dang / chad pa spang ba dang / zhi ba dang bde legs su 'gyur bar gyis shig/ de nas
359b2(mdo sde): rgyal po chen po dpung dang / g.yog dang / gnod sbyin brgya stong phrag du ma dang bcas pa khyed bzhis 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
359b3(mdo sde): rnams kyi chos kyi tshul kun tu bsrung bar 'gyur ro// yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su bzung bar yang 'gyur ro// de nas rgyal po chen po dpung dang / g.yog dang / gnod sbyin
359b4(mdo sde): 'bum phrag du ma dang bcas pa khyed bzhi lha dang lha ma yin g.yul 'gyed pa na rgyal bar 'gyur ro// lha ma yin/ rnams 'pham par 'gyur// 'di ltar gser 'od dam pa mdo
359b5(mdo sde): sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po pha rol gyi dmag tshogs thams cad/ 'dul bar byed pa 'di'i phyir dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge snyen ma mdo sde'i
359b6(mdo sde): dbang po 'dzin pa de dag la kun tu bsrung ba gyis shig/ yongasu bskyab pa dang / yongs su bzung ba dang / chod pa spang ba dang / bde legs su 'gyur ba gyis shig/ de nas rgyal po
359b7(mdo sde): chen po rnam thos kyi bu dang / rgyal po chen po yul 'khor bsrung dang / rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes po dang / rgyal po chen po mig mi bzang stan las langs te/ gos phrag pa
359b8(mdo sde): cig tu bgos nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol
360a1(mdo sde): to btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di grong ngam/ grong khyer ram/ grong rdal lam
360a2(mdo sde): ljongs sam/ yul 'khor tam/ pho brang 'khor gang du spyod par 'gyur ba dang / mi'i rgyal po gang dang gang gi yul du spyod par 'gyur ba dang / btsun pa bcom ldan 'das mi'i rgyal por
360a3(mdo sde): 'gyur ba gang la la zhig/ lha'i dbang po'i dam tshig rgyal po'i bstan chos 'dis rgyal po bgyid cing / rtag par rgyun tu gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di nyan tam/ rim
360a4(mdo sde): gro bgyid dam/ mchod pa bgyid dam/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge ba ste dan ma mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'dzin pa de dag la yang
360a5(mdo sde): bsti stang bgyid/ btsun par bgyid/ rim gror bgyid cing mchod de/ rtag par rgyun tu gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po nyan na/ chos nyan pa'i chu bo'i
360a6(mdo sde): chu// chos bdud rtsi'i khu ba 'dis/ bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / dpung dang / g.yog dang / gnod sbyin brgya stong phrag du ma'i lha'i lus 'di dag gzi brjid chen po rnam par
360a7(mdo sde): 'phel bar 'gyur/ bdag cag la brtson 'grus dang mthu dang stobs chen por yang bgyid par 'gyur/ bdag cag gi gzi brjid dang / dpal dang / phun sum tshogs pa yang rnam
360a8(mdo sde): par 'phel bar 'gyur ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi/ dpung dang g.yog du bcas pa/ gnod sbyin brgya stong phrag du ma dang / lus bstar
360b1(mdo sde): mi gda' bar bgyis te/ da ltar dang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na grong ngam/ grong khyer ram/ grong rdal lam/ ljongs sam/ yul 'khor ram/ pho brang 'khor gang na/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i
360b2(mdo sde): dbang po'i rgyal po 'di spyod par 'gyur ba de dag tu mchi bar bgyi'o// mi'i rgyal po gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di nyan pa dang / rim gro bgyid pa dang / mchod pa bgyid pa
360b3(mdo sde): de dag la kun tu bsrung bar bgyi'o// yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su gzung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba dang / chad pa spang ba dang / zhi ba dang / bde legs su 'gyur bar
360b4(mdo sde): bgyi'o// rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor de dag dang / yul 'khor de dag dang / yul de dag kyang kun tu bsrung bar bgyi'o// yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su
360b5(mdo sde): bzung ba dang / yongs su sbyang ba dang / chad pa spang ba dang / zhi ba dang bde legs su 'gyur bar bgyi'o// yul de dag kyang 'jigs pa dang gnod pa dang / 'khrug
360b6(mdo sde): pa thams cad las yongs su thar par bgyi'o// pha rol gyi dmag tshogs rnams kyang bzlog par bgyi'o// mi'i rgyal po gang la la gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di
360b7(mdo sde): nyan pa dang / rim 'gror bgyid pa dang / mchod pa bgyid pa de'i dag zla 'dab nye ba'i rgyal po gzhan zhig mchis la/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das nam dgra zla 'dab nye ba de'i rgyal po de
360b8(mdo sde): 'di snyam du bdag dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa dang / lhan cig tu yul der song ste/ yul de rnam par gzhig go snyam du sems bskyed na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das
361a1(mdo sde): de'i tshe de'i dus na/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di'i gzi brjid kyi mthus/ dgra zla 'dab nye ba'i rgyal po de rgyal po gzhan dag dang
361a2(mdo sde): g.yul 'gyed par 'gyur/ rang gi yul du phyin na yang yul 'khrug par 'gyur/ rgyal po'i 'khrag pa mi bzad pa yang 'byung bar 'gyur/ yul du gza' dang nad kyang 'byung bar 'gyur
361a3(mdo sde): yul du brel ba sna tshogs brgya dag kyang 'byung bar 'gyur ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das nam dgra zla 'dab nye ba'i rgyal po rang gi yul du phyin na gnod pa sna tshogs brgya dang / brel ba
361a4(mdo sde): sna tshogs brgya 'di lta bu 'byung ngo // btsun pa bcom ldan 'das dgra zla 'dab nye ba'i rgyal po de yan lag bzhi dpa'i dmag bsogs te/ pha rol gyi dmag tshogs su mchi
361a5(mdo sde): ba'i slad du/ rang gi yul nas byung ste/ dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa dang / lhan cig tu yul der mchi 'tshal ba dang / gang na gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i
361a6(mdo sde): rgyal po 'di gnas pa'i yul de rnam par gzhig 'tshal bar gyur na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi dpung dang / g.yog tu bcas pa/ gnod sbyin brgya stong
361a7(mdo sde): du ma dang lhan cig tu lus mi gda' bar bgyis te/ der mchi bar bgyi'o// pha rol gyi dmag tshogs de shul du zhugs pa las kyang de nyid nas ldog par bgyi'o// bral ba sna tshogs brgya
361a8(mdo sde): dag kyang nye bar bsgrub par bgyi'o// bgegs kyang bgyi'o// 'di lta ste/ yul der pha rol gyi dmigs tshogs de mchi ba yang mi nus na/ yul gzhig par bgyid pa lta ga la 'gyur/ de nas
361b1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po chen po bzhi po dag la legs so// zhes bya ba byin te/ rgyal po chen po dag legs so legs so// rgyal po chen po dag khyed yang legs te/ khyed bskal pa grangs med
361b2(mdo sde): pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du bsgrubs pa/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'di'i phyir/ mi'i rgyal po gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di nyan pa dang / ri mo
361b3(mdo sde): byed pa dang / mchod pa de dag la kun du bsrung ba gyis shig/ yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su gzung ba dang / yongs su bskyad pa dang / chad pa spang ba dang / zhi ba dang bad legs su
361b4(mdo sde): 'gyur ba gyis shig/ rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor de dag da dang / grong khyer de dag dang / yul 'khor de dag da dang / yul de dag kyang kun tu srungs shig/ yongs su bskyab/ 
361b5(mdo sde): pa dang / yongs su bzung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba dang chad pa spang ba dang / zhi ba dang bde legs su 'gyur ba gyis shig/ yul de dag kyang 'jigs pa dang / 
361b6(mdo sde): gnod pa dang 'khrug pa thams cad las yongs su thar par gyis shig/ pha rol gyi dmigs tshogs rnams kyang zlogs shig/ 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad na gnas pa'i mi'i rgyal
361b7(mdo sde): po dag mi 'thab pa dang / 'tshang mi 'bru ba dang / mi brtsod pa dang / mi 'gyed par bya ba la spro bar gyis shig/ rgyal po chen po dang dang g.yog tu bcas pa khyed bzhi'i 'dzam bu'i gling
361b8(mdo sde): 'dir/ nam grong khyer brgyad khri bzhi stong de dag na/ rgyal po brgyad khri bzhi stong de dag rang rang gi yul la mngon par dga' ba dang / rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug des mngon par dga'
362a1(mdo sde): ba dang / rang gi nor gyi phung pos phan tshun rnam par 'tshe ba mi bskyed pa dang / rang gis ji ltar sngon gyi las bsags pas rgyal po thob pa'i rang gi rgyal
362a2(mdo sde): srid kyi dbang phyug gis dga' ba dang / phan tshun du yul 'jigs par mi byed pa dang / yul gzhig pa'i phyir pha rol gyi gnod pa dag/ nam 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir grong khyer brgyad khri bzhi
362a3(mdo sde): stong dag na/ rgyal po brgyad khri bzhi stong de dag phan tshun du byams pa'i sems su 'gyur/ byams pa'i sems dang phan pa'i sems su 'gyur te/ phan tshun du mi 'thab mtshang mi 'bru
362a4(mdo sde): mi brtsod mi 'gyed par rang gi yul dag na dga' bar 'gyur na/ de'i phyir rgyal po chen po dpung dang g.yog tu bcas pa khyed bzhi/ 'dzam bu'i gling 'di rgyas par
362a5(mdo sde): 'gyur/ lo legs par 'gyur/ nyams dga' bar 'gyur/ skye bo mang po dang mis gang bar 'gyur/ sa yang mdangs can du 'gyur/ dus dang zla ba dang / zla ba
362a6(mdo sde): phyed dang lo khyud khor thams cad kyang dag pa'i dus dang ldan par 'gyur/ gza' dang rgyu skar dang / zla ba dang nyi ma yang nyin mtshan du legs par rgyu bar 'gyur/ char pa'i
362a7(mdo sde): rgyun kyang sa la dus dus su 'bab par 'gyur/ 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad na gnas pa'i sems can rnams kyang nor dang 'bru thams cad 'byor par 'gyur/ longs spyod che
362a8(mdo sde): ba dang / ser sna med par 'gyur gtong ba dang ldan par 'gyur/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang ldan par 'gyur/ phal cher bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du skye bar 'gyur/ 
362b1(mdo sde): lha'i khang khyim rnams kyang lha dang lha'i bu rnams kyis gang bar 'gyur ro// rgyal po chen po gang dag la la zhig mi'i rgyal por gyur la/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po
362b2(mdo sde): 'di nyan par 'gyur te/ rim gro byas/ mchod pa byas/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma mdo sde'i dbang por rgyal po 'dzin pa de dag la yang sti stang
362b3(mdo sde): byed/ bla mar byed/ rim gro byed/ mchod pa byed cing rgyas bachen po khyed bzhi dpung dang g.yog du bcas pa/ gnod sbyin brgya stong phrag du ma la snying rtse ba'i phyir/ rtag par rgyun tu
362b4(mdo sde): gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'dinyan na/ chos mnyan pa'i chu'i klung / bdud rtsi'i khro dab 'dis khyed cag gi lus 'di dag tshim par 'gyur ro// 
362b5(mdo sde): khyed kyis lha'i lus 'di dag gi gzi brjid chen po yang rnam par 'phel lo// khyed kyi brtson 'grus dang mthu dang / stobs kyang skyed do// khyed gzi brjid dang
362b6(mdo sde): dpal dang phun sum tshogs pa yang rnam par 'phel lo// mi'i rgyal po des de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa nga la yang mchod pa
362b7(mdo sde): bsam gyis mi khyab pa rgya chen po yangs pa byas par 'gyur ro// mi'i rgyal po des 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba khrag khrig
362b8(mdo sde): brgya stong du ma la yang / yo byad bsam gyis mi khyab pa rgya che ba yangs pa thams cad kyis mchod pa byas par 'gyur ro// des na mi'i rgyal po de la bsrung ba chen po byas
363a1(mdo sde): bar 'gyur ro// des na mi'i rgyal po de la kun tu bsrung ba dang / yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su gzung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba dang / chad pa spang ba
363a2(mdo sde): dang razhi ba dang bde legs su 'gyur ba byas par 'gyur ro// btsun mo dam pa dang / rgyal bu rnams dang / btsun mo'i 'khor thams cad dang / rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor thams cad kyang bsrung
363a3(mdo sde): ba chen po byas par 'gyur/ yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su bzung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba dang / chad pa spang ba dang / zhi ba dang / bde legs su 'gyur ba byas par 'gyur/ 
363a4(mdo sde): rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor na gnas pa'i lha thams cadad kyang chas gzi brjid dang ldan pa dang / ches stobs de dang ldan pa dang / bde ba dang / yid bde ba bsam gyis mi khyab
363a5(mdo sde): pa dang ldan par 'gyur/ dga' ba sna tshogs myong bar 'gyur/ grong khyer de dag dang / yul 'khor de dgakyang kun tu bsrungs par 'gyur/ yongs su bskyangs par
363a6(mdo sde): 'gyuraganod pa med par 'gyur/ dgra med par 'gyur/ pha rol gyi dmag tshogs thams cad kyis mi brdzi ba dang / gnod pa med pa dang 'khrug pa med par 'gyur ro// de skad ces bka'
363a7(mdo sde): stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu dang / rgyal po chen po yul 'khor bsrung dang / rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes po dang / rgyal po chen po mig mi bzang
363a8(mdo sde): de dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ mi'i rgyal po gang la la zhig gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di yang nyan 'tshal bar 'gyur/ 
363b1(mdo sde): bdag nyid la yang bsrung ba chen po bgyid 'tshal bar 'gyur/ btsun mo dam pa dang / rgyal bu rnams dang / rgyal po'i bu mo rnams dang / btsun mo'i 'khor gyi tshogs rnams la'ang bsrung ba
363b2(mdo sde): chen po bgyid 'tshal bar 'gyur/ rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor de dag thams cad la yang zhi ba dang / bde legs su 'gyur ba chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa mchog tu khyad par 'phags pa bla na
363b3(mdo sde): med pa bgyid 'tshal bar gyur/ tshe 'di la bdag gi rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa rnam par 'phel bar bgyid 'tshal bar gyur/ rgyal po nyid bsam gyis mi
363b4(mdo sde): khyab pa dang ldan par gyur/ bsod nams kyi phung po dpag tu ma mchis pa yongs su 'dzin 'tshal bar gyur/ bdag gi yul thams cad kyang kun tu bsrung 'tshal
363b5(mdo sde): bar gyurayongs su bskyang 'tshal bar gyur/ rang gi/ yul na gnod pa ma mchis pa dang / dgra ma mchis/ pa dang / pha rol gyi dmag tshogs kyis mi rdzi ba dang / 
363b6(mdo sde): nad 'go ba ma mchis pa dang / 'khrug pa ma mchis par bgyid 'tshal bar gyur na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das mi'i rgyal po des g.yang ba ma mchis pa'i sems dang / gus pa dang
363b7(mdo sde): bcas pa dang / ri mo dang bcas pas gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po sti stang du bgyis te/ mnyan par bgyi'o// gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di
363b8(mdo sde): mnyan pa'i slad du/ mi'i rgyal po des rgyal po'i pho brang khyad par 'phags par mchi bar bgyi'o// der mchis nas kyang rgyal po'i pho brang spos chab sna tshogs kyis chag chag gdab
364a1(mdo sde): cing me tog gi sil ma sna tshogs bkram par bgyi'o// spos chab sna tshogs kyis chag chag btab pa der chos kyi khri mthon po rgyan sna tshogs kyis legs
364a2(mdo sde): bar brgyan pa bsham par bgyi'o// phyogs der gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan sna tshogs kyis legs par brgyan par bgyi'o// mi'i rgyal po des lus bkru bar bgyi'o// gos dri
364a3(mdo sde): rab tu bda' ba gos gsar pa mdzes pa bgos nas/ rgyan sna tshogs kyis brgyan par bgyi'o// bdag gi stan rab tu dma' ba gding bar bgyi ste/ stan de la mchis nas/ rgyal po'i
364a4(mdo sde): rgyags pas dregs par mi bgyi'o// der rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la chags par mi bgyi'o// rgyags pa da dang nga rgyal dang dregs pa thams cad rnam par spangs pa'i
364a5(mdo sde): sems kyis/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di mnyan par bgyi'o// dge slong chos smra ba de la yang ston par 'du shes bskyed par bgyi'o// mi'i
364a6(mdo sde): rgyal po des de'i tshe deng dus na/ btsun mo dam pa dang / rgyal bu rnams dang / rgyal po'i bu mo rnams dang / btsun mo'i 'khor gyi tshogs rnams la sdug pa dang phan pas blta bar bgyi'o// 
364a7(mdo sde): btsun mo dam pa dang / rgyal bu rnams dang / rgyal po'i bu mo rnams la tshig snyan pa smra bar bgyi'o// btsun mo'i 'khor gyi tshogs thams cad la yang tshig snyan pa smra bar bgyi'o// 
364a8(mdo sde): chos mnyan pa'i mchod pa rnam pa sna tshogs sbyor du stsal bar bgyi'o// dga' ba bsam gyis mi khyab cing mtshungs pa ma mchis pas bdag tshim par bgyi'o// dga' ba dang
364b1(mdo sde): bde ba bsam gyis mi khyab pas bde bar bgyi'o// dbang po bde bar bgyi'o// bdag nyid don chen po thob par bsam par bgyi'o// bdag dga' ba chen pos dga' bar bgyi'o// rab tu
364b2(mdo sde): dga' ba chen po bskyed nas/ chos smra ba bsu bar bgyi'o// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po chen po bzhi la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rgyal po chen po dag
364b3(mdo sde): de'i tshe de'i dus na/ mi'i rgyal po des gos thams cad dkar po sar pa mdzes pa bgo bar bya'o// spud pa dang / rgyan sna tshogs kyis bdag legs par brgyan par bya'o// de'i phyir
364b4(mdo sde): gdugs dkar po yang gzung bar bya'o// rgyal po'i mthu chen po dang / rgyal po bkod pa chen pos bkra shis tha dad pa sna tshogs thogs te/ rgyal po'i pho brang de nas byung
364b5(mdo sde): lang tshes smra ba bsu ba'i phyir der 'gro bar bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mi'i rgyal pos der gom pa ji snyed por ba de snyed kyi bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi 'khor ba
364b6(mdo sde): phyir bsnyil bar 'gyur/ de snyed kyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal rigs bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong thob par 'gyur/ der gom pa ji snyed bor ba de snyed du/ tshe 'di la rgyal srid kyi dbang
364b7(mdo sde): phyug chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa 'phel bar 'gyur/ bskal ba bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du mar gnas yangs shing rgya che ba lha'i gzhal med khang rin po che sna bdun las
364b8(mdo sde): byas pa dag thob par 'gyur/ mi rnams kyi rgyal rigs lha'i rgya che zhing / rgya che ba brgya stong phrag du ma thob par 'gyur/ skye ba thams cad du dbang phyug chen po thob par 'gyur/ 
365a1(mdo sde): tshe ring bar 'gyur/ yun ring du 'tsho bar 'gyur/ spobs pa dang ldan par 'gyur/ tshig gzung bar 'os par 'gyur/ grags pa dang ldan par 'gyur/ brjod pa
365a2(mdo sde): shin tu rgya che bar 'gyur/ bsngags par 'os par 'gyur/ lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten la phan par 'gyur/ lha dang mi rnams kyi bde ba rgya che zhing rgya che ba thob par
365a3(mdo sde): 'gyur stobs che bar 'gyur/ tshan po che chen po'i stobs kyi shugs dang ldan zhing / gzugs bzang bar 'gyur/ mdzes pa dang blta na sdug pa dang kha dog bzang po rgyas pa mchog
365a4(mdo sde): dang ldan par 'gyur/ skye ba thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa dang phrad par 'gyur/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams rnyed par 'gyur/ bsod nams kyi phung po dpag
365a5(mdo sde): tu med pa yongs su gzung bar 'gyur te/ rgyal po chen po dag yon tan gyi phan yon 'di lta bu 'di dag mthong / nas/ mi'i rgyal po des dpag tshad tsam du chos smra ba
365a6(mdo sde): bsu bar bya dpag tshad brgya dang dpag tshad stong du yang bsu bar bya/ chos smra ba de la ston par 'du shes bskyed par bya'o// 'di snyam du yang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
365a7(mdo sde): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa dang bdag gi rgyal po'i pho brang 'dir 'jug par 'gyur ro// deng de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
365a8(mdo sde): rgyas shAkya thub pa/ bdag gi rgyal po'i pho brang 'dir bshos gsol par 'gyur ro// deng bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
365b1(mdo sde): shAkya thub pa'i chos 'jig rten thams cad dang / mi mthun pa mnyan par bya'o// deng bdag chos mnyan pa 'dis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog
365b2(mdo sde): par bya'o// deng bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma mnyes par byas par 'gyur ro// deng bdag gis 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i
365b3(mdo sde): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la mchod pa chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa yangs shing rgya che ba byas par 'gyur ro// dang bdag gis sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye
365b4(mdo sde): gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi sdug bsngal thams cad shin tu rgyun chad par 'gyur ro// deng bdag gis tshangs pa'i dbang po'i rgyal po nyid kyi lus bye ba khrag khrig
365b5(mdo sde): brgya stong phrag du ma 'thob pa dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i sa bon bskyed par 'gyur ro// deng bdag gis brgya byin nyid kyi lus bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma 'thob pa dag
365b6(mdo sde): gi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i sa bon skyed par 'gyur ro// dang bdag gis 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po nyid kyi lus bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma 'thob pa dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par
365b7(mdo sde): 'gyur ro// deng bskal ba bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du mar 'khor ba las yongs su thar par byas par 'gyur ro// deng bdag gis bsod nams kyi phung po dpag tu med pa/ bla na
365b8(mdo sde): med pa yangs shing rgya che ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa yongs su gzung bar 'gyur ro// deng bdag gis btsun mo'i 'khor gyi tshogs thams cad la bsrung ba chen po byas par 'gyur ro// 
366a1(mdo sde): deng bdag gis rgyal po'i pho brang 'dir zhi ba dang bde legs su 'gyur ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa mchog tu 'phags pa bla na med pa byas par 'gyur ro// deng bdag
366a2(mdo sde): gi yul 'di thams cad kun du bsrungs par 'gyur ro// yongs su bskyangs pa dang / gnod pa med pa dang / dgra med pa dang / pha rol gyi dmag tshogs thams cad kyis mi rdzi ba dang / nad 'gro ba
366a3(mdo sde): med pa dang / 'khrug pa med par 'gyur ro// snyam du sems bskyed par bya'o// rgyal po chen po dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i
366a4(mdo sde): dbang po'i rgyal po 'dzin pa dag la mi'i rgyal po de dag chos ral gus pa 'di lta bu sti sting byed/ bla mar byed/ rim gro byed/ mchod pa byed cing / rgyal po chen po khyed bzhi
366a5(mdo sde): dpung dang g.yog tu bcas pa dang / lha'i tshogs de dag/ dang / gnod sbyin brgya stong phrag du ma dag la shas kyi dam pa byin na/ mi'i rgyal po de bsod nams mngon
366a6(mdo sde): par 'du byed pa dang / dge ba mngon par 'du byed pa de dang tshe 'di'i lus kyi rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa des rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur ro// tshe
366a7(mdo sde): 'di la rgyal po'i gzi brjid chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / ldan par 'gyur ro// dpal dang phun sum tshogs pa dang gzi brjid kyis kyang brgyan par 'gyur ro// phyir rgol ba
366a8(mdo sde): thams cad dang / dgra thams cad chos dang 'thun pas shin tu tshar gcod par 'gyur ro// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po chen po bzhi po de dag
366b1(mdo sde): gis 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig mi'i rgyal por gyur la/ de chos la gus pa de lta bus gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po nyan la/ 
366b2(mdo sde): dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'dzin pa/ de dag la yang sti stang bgyid/ bla mar bgyid/ rim gror bgyid mchod
366b3(mdo sde): par bgyid cing / rgyal po chen po bdag cag gi slad du/ rgyal po'i pho brang de shin tu dag par phyag dar bgyid/ spos chab sna tshogs kyis chag chag legs par 'debs la/ 
366b4(mdo sde): bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / lhan cig thun mong du chos mnyan pa de nyan cing / bdag dang lha thams cad kyi slad du dge ba'i rtsa ba'i shas cung zad gcig sbyin
366b5(mdo sde): pa bgyid na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das dge slong chos smra ba de chos kyi stan la mchis ma thag tu mi'i// rgyal po des bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi'i don gyi
366b6(mdo sde): slad du spos chab sna tshogs kyis bdug par bgyi'o// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po de la mchod pa'i slad du bdug pas gdugs ma thag tu
366b7(mdo sde): spos sna tshogs rnams las spos dang / bdug pa sna tshogs kyis 'khri shing dag 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de skad cig thang cig yud tsam de la rgyal po chen po bzhi bdag cag
366b8(mdo sde): bzhi'i rang rang gi khang pa'i steng gi bar snang la spos dang / bdug pa sna tshogs kyi 'khri shing dag gi gdugs rnams su gnas par 'gyur/ spos dri rgya chen po yang mnam
367a1(mdo sde): bar gyur/ gser gyi kha dog lta bu'i snang ba 'byung bar 'gyur zhing snang ba des bdag cag gi khang pa rnams kyang snang ba bgyis par 'gyur ro// btsun pa
367a2(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das spos dang bdug pa sna tshogs kyis 'khri shing dag skad cig thang cig yud tsam de la mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang / lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin dang / lha mo chen/ 
367a3(mdo sde): po dbyangs can dang / lha mo chen mo brtan ma dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po yang dag shes dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang / lha'i bu dbang phyug
367a4(mdo sde): chen po dang gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po nor bu bzang dang / 'phrog ma bu lnga brgya'i 'khor dang ldan pa dang
367a5(mdo sde): klu'i rgyal po ma dros pa dang / klu'i rgyal po chen po rgya mtsho dang / de dag rang rang gi khang pa'i steng gi bar/ snang la byung ste/ spos dang bdug pa sna tshogs kyi khri shing
367a6(mdo sde): gi gdugs rnams su gnas par 'gyur ro// spos dri sna tshogs rgya chen po yang mnam par 'gyur/ khang pa rnams kyi nang du gser du snang ba 'byung bar 'gyur zhing snang ba des gnas
367a7(mdo sde): thams cad snang ba bgyis par 'gyuraro// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po chen po bzhi la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rgyal po chen po dag rgyal po chen po khyed/ 
367a8(mdo sde): bzhi'i rang rang gi khang pa rnams kyi steng gi bar snang la spos dang / bdug pa sna tshogs kyi khri shing de dag gdugs rnams su gnas par ma zad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rgyal po
367b1(mdo sde): chen po dag mi'i rgyal po des gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di la mchod pa'i phyir/ spos sna tshogs de dag gis gdugs ma thag tu lag na pog snod cig thogs pa de las
367b2(mdo sde): spos dang / bdug pa sna tshogs kyi khri shing rnams byung bar gyur te/ de skad cig thang cig yud tsam de la stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di thams cad na gang na zla ba bye
367b3(mdo sde): ba phrag brgya dang / nyi ma bye ba phrag brgya dang / rgya mtsho chen po bye ba phrag brgya dang / ri'i rgyal po ri rab bye ba phrag brgya dang / ri'i rgyal po khor yug dang / khor yug chen po bye ba phrag
367b4(mdo sde): brgya dang / gling bzhi pa chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba phrag brgya dang / rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lnga bye ba phrag brgya dang / sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha bye ba phrag brgya nas
367b5(mdo sde): 'du shes med 'du shes med min du nye bar song ba'i bar gyi lha bye ba phrag brgya dang / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams de dag thams cad du sum
367b6(mdo sde): cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i rigs bye ba phrag brgya po thams cad na/ lha dang klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po
367b7(mdo sde): tshogs rnams kyis rang rang gi khang pa dag gi bar snang la spos dang bdug pa sna tshogs kyi khri shing de dag gdugs rnams su gnas par 'gyur/ spos dri rgya chen po yang mnam
367b8(mdo sde): bar 'gyur/ lha'i khang pa rnams su gser gyi kha dog lta bu'i snang ba yang 'thung bar 'gyur zhing / snang ba des kyang lha'i khang pa rnams snang bar byas par 'gyur ro// rgyal po chen po
368a1(mdo sde): dag stong gsum gyi stong chen por 'jig rten gyi khams na/ lha'i khang pa thams cad kyi steng gi bar snang la spos dang / bdug pa'i khri shing de dag gdugs
368a2(mdo sde): rnams su gnas pa de bzhin du gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di la mchod pa'i phyir/ mi'i rgyal po des spos chab sna tshogs de dag gis bdugs ma thag tu gser 'od dam
368a3(mdo sde): pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di'i gzi brjid kyi mthus/ spos dang bdug pa sna tshogs kyi 'khri shing dag 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de dag skad cig thang cig yud tsam de la kun tu phyogs
368a4(mdo sde): bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams du ma gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong rnamasu de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba khrag khrig
368a5(mdo sde): brgya stong phrag du ma la gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag gi bar snang la/ spos dang / bdug pa sna tshogs kyi 'khri shing rnams su gnas par 'gyur/ de dag kyang sangs
368a6(mdo sde): rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma la/ spos dang bdag pa sna tshogs rgya che zhing rgya che ba mnam par 'gyur/ gser gyi kha dog lta bu'i snang ba 'byung bar 'gyur zhing / snang ba
368a7(mdo sde): des sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag snang ba byas par 'gyur ro// rgyal po chen po dag cho 'phrul de lta bu de dag byung ma thag tu/ 
368a8(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag chos smra ba de la dgongs par 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa leg so// legs so// skyes bu
368b1(mdo sde): dam pa khyed gser 'ong dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po tshul 'di lta bu zab mo'i don 'di lta bu zab mor snang ba 'di lta bu yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan pa 'di lta bu 'di rgyu
368b2(mdo sde): cher yang dag par rab tu 'chad bar 'dod pa khyod yang legs so// legs so// zhes bya ba sbyin par 'gyur ro// su tha na gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di nyan pa'i sems
368b3(mdo sde): can de dag kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba ngan ngon dang ldan par mi 'gyur na/ gang dag 'dzin pa dang 'chang ba dang / 'chad pa dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / 'khor la rgya
368b4(mdo sde): cher yang dag par rab tu ston pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ skyes bu dam pa gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di thos ma thag tu byang chub
368b5(mdo sde): sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma bla na/ med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro// / 
368b6(mdo sde): bam po gsum pa// de nas phyogs bcu kun tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya
368b7(mdo sde): stong phrag du ma rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing na bzhugs pa dag gis de'i tshe de'i dus na/ cho ga gcig dang / ngag gcig dang / sgra skad gcig gis dge slong chos smra ba/ chos kyi
368b8(mdo sde): stan la 'dug pa de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// skyes bu dam pa khyod ma 'ongs pa'i dus na byang chub kyi snying por 'gro bar 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa khyod byang chub kyi snying po
369a1(mdo sde): mchog dam pa song ste/ shing gi rgyal po'i drung du 'dug nas/ 'jig rten gsum po thams cad las khyad par du 'phags pa sems can thams cad las rab
369a2(mdo sde): tu 'das pa'i brtul zhugs dang / dka' thub spyod pa'i stobs bskyed pa'i byin gyis brlabs dka' ba spyod pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma dag ston par 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa khyod
369a3(mdo sde): byang chub kyi snying po legs par brgyan par byed par 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa khyod stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad yongs su skyob par 'gyur/ skyes bu
369a4(mdo sde): dam pa khyod shing gi rgyal po'i drung du 'dug ste/ bdud kyi sde bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ gzugs rab tu 'jigs 'jigs ltar 'dug pa/ mi sdug pa ston pa gzugs mi
369a5(mdo sde): sdug pa sna tshogs dag las rgyal bar 'gyur/ skyes bu dam/ pa khyod byang chub kyi snying po mchog dam par song ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dpe med pa
369a6(mdo sde): rab tu zhi ba rdul dang bral ba/ zab mo mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa khyod rdo rje'i gdan snying po brtan pa la 'jug ste/ chos kyi 'khor lo rgyal ba thams
369a7(mdo sde): cad kyis mngon par bstod pa/ mchog tu zab pa/ bla na med pa rnam pa bcu gnyis su rab tu bskor bar 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa khyod chos kyi rnga chen po bla na med pa rdung bar 'gyur
369a8(mdo sde): skyes bu dam pa khyod chos kyi dung bla na med pa 'bud par 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa khyod chos kyi rgyal mtshan chen po bsgreng bar 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa khyod chos kyi sgron ma bla na
369b1(mdo sde): med pa 'bar bar byed par 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa khyod chos kyi char bla na med pa 'bebs par 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa khyod nyon mongs pa'i dgra stong phrag du ma las rgyal bar 'gyur/ 
369b2(mdo sde): skyes bu dam pa khyod sems can bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma shin tu 'jigs su rung ba/ 'jigs pa chen po'i rgya mtsho las sgrol bar 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa khyod sems can
369b3(mdo sde): bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma dag 'khor ba'i 'khor lo las yongs su thar par byed par 'gyur/ skyes bu dam pa khyod sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma dag mnyes
369b4(mdo sde): par byed par 'gyur ro// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po chen po bzhi po de dag gi/ nas/ 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das
369b5(mdo sde): mi'i rgyal po gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'i yon tan tshe 'di dang / ma 'ongs pa na 'byung ba 'di lta bu 'di dag mthong ba/ sangs rgyas stong phrag brgya la
369b6(mdo sde): dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa/ bsod nams kyi phung po dpag tu med pa yongs su 'dzin par mthong nas/ snying brtse ba'i slad du/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi
369b7(mdo sde): dpung dang g.yog tu bcas pa dang / gnod sbyin brgya stong phrag du ma rang rang gi khang pa na mchis pa dag/ spos dang / bdug pa sna tshogs kyis 'khri shing dag gi gdugs kyis bskul ma thag
369b8(mdo sde): tu lus mi gda' bar bgyis te/ mi'i rgyal po de'i khang pa brtsegs pa phyag dar ma bgyis pa legs par phyag dar bgyis pa/ spos chab sna tshogs kyi chag chag lags par btab pa/ 
370a1(mdo sde): rgyan sna tshogs kyis legs par brgyan pa'i rgyal po'i pho brang ga la ba der chos mnyan pa'i slad du mchi bar bgyi'o// mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang / lha rnams
370a2(mdo sde): kyi dbang po brgya byin dang / lha mo chen mo dbyangs can/ lha mo chen mo dpal dang / sa'i lha mo brtan ma dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po yang dag shes dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po nyi shu
370a3(mdo sde): rtsa brgyad dang / lha'i bu dbang phyug chen po dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po nor bu bzang dang / 'phrog ma bu lnga brgya'i 'khor can dang / 
370a4(mdo sde): klu'i rgyal po ma dros pa dang / klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho dang / de lha bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma dag lus mi gda' bar bgyis te/ mi'i rgyal po de'i pho brang rgyan sna tshogs
370a5(mdo sde): kyis brgyan pa de ga la ba dang / chos smra ba de'i chos kyi khri mthon po rgyan sna tshogs kyis legs par brgyan pa/ me tog bkram pa'i sa la bshams par 'gyur ba ga la
370a6(mdo sde): ba der chos mnyan pa'i slad du/ 'chi bar bgyi'o// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po dpung dang g.yog tu bcas pa/ gnod sbyin brgya stong phrag du ma de dag thams cad
370a7(mdo sde): dang 'thun par bgyis te/ mi'i rgyal po dge ba'i grogs bgyis pa/ dge ba 'thob par bgyid pa bla na med pa/ chos kyi sbyin pa chen po sbyin pa de la chos bdud rtsi'i khu ba 'dis tshim par
370a8(mdo sde): gyur ma thag tu/ mi'i rgyal po de la kun tu srung bar bgyi'o// yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su bzung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba dang / chad pa spang ba dang / zhi ba dang / bde legs
370b1(mdo sde): su 'gyur bar bgyi'o// rgyal po'i pho brang de dang / grong khyer de dang / yul de yang kun tu bsrung bar bgyi'o// yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su gzung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba dang / 
370b2(mdo sde): chad pa spang ba dang / zhi ba dang / bde legs su 'gyur bar bgyi'o// chad pa spang bar yang 'gyi'o// yul de yang 'jigs pa dang / gnod pa dang / nad 'gro ba dang / 'khrug pa thams cad
370b3(mdo sde): las yongs su thar par bgyi'o// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig mi'i rgyal por gyur te/ mi'i rgyal po de'i yul du/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po
370b4(mdo sde): 'di byung la/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das mi'i rgyal po de dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dag bsnyen ma gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal
370b5(mdo sde): bo 'di 'dzin pa dag la sti stang mi bgyid/ bla mar mi brgya da/ rim gro mi bgyid/ mchod pa mi bgyid na/ bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / gnod sbyin bye ba khrag khrig
370b6(mdo sde): brgya stong phrag du ma la chos mnyan pa 'di dang / chos bdud rtsi'i khu ba 'dis tshim par mi bgyid/ rim gro mi bgyid/ lha'i lus 'di dag gi gzi brjid 'ang rnam par 'phel bar mi bgyid/ 
370b7(mdo sde): bdag cag gi brtson 'grus dang / mthu dang stobs kyang mi bskyed/ bdag cag gi lus la gzi brjid dang / dpal dang / phun sum tshogs pa yang rnam par 'phel bar mi bgyid do// btsun
370b8(mdo sde): ba bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi dpung dang g.yog tu bcas pa dang / gnod sbyin bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma dag gis yul de yal bar dor bar bgyi'o// 
371a1(mdo sde): btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis yul de yal bar bor na yul na gnas pa'i lha'i tshogs thams cad kyis kyang yal bar 'dor bar 'gyur ro// 
371a2(mdo sde): btsun pa bcom ldan 'das lha rnams kyis yul de yal bar bor na/ yul rnams 'khrug pa sna tshogs 'byung bar 'gyur/ rgyal po'i 'khrug pa mi bzad pa dag 'byung bar 'gyur/ yul
371a3(mdo sde): na gnas pa'i sems can thams cad kyang 'thab pa skyes pa dang / 'tshang 'dru ba skye bar 'gyur/ rtsod pa skye bar 'gyur/ dngogs pa dang / 'gyed par 'gyur ba dang / gza'
371a4(mdo sde): dang nad rnam pa sna tshogs yul du 'byung bar 'gyur//  phyogs tha dad pa nas skar mda' ltung bar 'gyur/ 8 gza' dang rgyu skar rnams kyang phan tshun mi mthun par
371a5(mdo sde): gda' bar 'gyur/ dgung zla 'char ba na nyi ma lta bur gda' bar 'gyur/ zla ba'i gza' dang nyi ma'i gza'/ 'byung bar 'gyur/ nyi ma dang zla ba nam mkha' la gnas
371a6(mdo sde): pa yang rtag par rgyun du sgra gcan zin gyi gnod pa dang ldan par 'gyur/ dus dus su nam mkha' la gzha'i kha dog lta bu 'khyil bar 'gyur/ sa yang g.yo bar 'gyur/ sa la
371a7(mdo sde): gnas pa'i khron pa yang sgra 'byin par grag par 'gyur/ yul du rlung drag po ldang bar 'gyur/ char drag po 'bab par 'gyur/ yul du mu ge'i dgon pa 'byung bar 'gyur/ 
371a8(mdo sde): pha rol gyi dmag tshogs kyis yul 'joms par 'gyur/ yul de phung par 'gyur/ sems can de dag kyang nyon mongs pa mang bar 'gyur/ yul de nyams mi dga' bar 'gyur
371b1(mdo sde): btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi dpung dang g.yog tu bcas pa dang gnod sbyin brgya stong phrag du ma dang / yul na gnas pa dang / klu rnams kyis yul de yal bar
371b2(mdo sde): bor na/ yul der 'di lta bu'i gnod pa sna tshogs brgya dang / gnod pa stong 'byung bar 'gyur ro// tsun pa bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig mi'i rgyal por gyur la/ de bdag nyid la kun tu
371b3(mdo sde): srung ba chen po bgyid 'tshal bar gyur/ rgyal po'i bde ba sna tshogs yun ring por myong 'tshal bar 'gyur/ bde ba thams cad stabs pa'i sems kyis rgyal po nyid bgyid 'tshal bar
371b4(mdo sde): gyur/ yul na gnas pa'i sems can thams cad bde/ bar bgyid 'tshal bar gyur/ pha rol gyi dmag tshogs thams cad pham par bgyid 'tshal bar gyur/ 
371b5(mdo sde): yul thams cad yun ring du yongs su skyong 'tshal bgyur/ chos kyi rgyal po nyid bgyid 'tshal bar gyurarang gi yul yang 'jigs pa dang / gnod pa dang nang
371b6(mdo sde): 'gro ba dang 'khrug pa thams cad las yongs su thar par bgyid 'tshal bar gyur na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das mi'i rgyal po nges gdon mi 'tshal bar gser 'od dam pa mdo
371b7(mdo sde): sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di mnyan par bgyi dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma mdo sde'i dbang po 'dzin pa de dag la yang sti stang bgyi/ bla mar 'gyi
371b8(mdo sde): rim gro bgyi/ mchod pa 'gyi/ bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi dpung dang g.yog tu bcas pa rnams kyang / chos mnyan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags pa 'di dang / chos bdud rtsi'i cha
372a1(mdo sde): ba 'dis tshim par bgyi/ bdag cag gi lha'i lus 'di dag gi gzi brjid chen po yang rnam par 'phel bar bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ btsun pa bcom ldan
372a2(mdo sde): 'das mi'i rgyal po des gdon mi 'tshal bar gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di mnyan par bgyi ste/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das tshangs pa'i dbang pos 'jig rten dang
372a3(mdo sde): 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bstan chos rnam pa sna tshogs ji snyed bstan pa dag dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis bstan chos rnam pa sna tshogs ji snyed bstan pa dag dang / drang srong mngon
372a4(mdo sde): bar shes pa lnga can rnam pa sna tshogs dag gis sems can dag gi don gyi slad du/ 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bstan chos rnam pa sna
372a5(mdo sde): tshogs ji snyed bstan pa dag pa'i ches mchog ches khyad du 'phags pa/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbangapo'i rgyal po 'di ni/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das
372a6(mdo sde): tshangs pa'i dbang po brgya phrag stong de dag dang / brgya byin bye ba khrag khrig phrag du ma dang / drang srong mngon par shes pa lnga can bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong thams cad bas ches
372a7(mdo sde): mchog ces khyad par du 'phags pa'i de bzhin gshegs pas sems can rnams kyi don gyi slad du rgya cher yang dag par bshad pa lagaso// ji ltar 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad na
372a8(mdo sde): gnas pa'i mi rnams kyi rgyal pos rgyal po nyid bgyi ba dang / ji ltar sems can thams cad bde bar 'gyur ba dang / ji ltar rang gi yul kun tu bsrung bar 'gyur ba dang / yongs su
372b1(mdo sde): bskyangs par 'gyur ba dang / ji ltar yul thams cad na gnod pa dang / dgra ma mchis par 'gyur ba dang / ji ltar pha rol gyi dmag tshogs rnams pham ste/ phyir phyogs par 'gyur ba dang / 
372b2(mdo sde): ltar yul de dag nad 'go ba ma mchis shing / 'khrug pa ma mchis par 'gyur ba dang / ji ltar yul thams cad chos kyis 'khrag pa ma mchis shing mi rdzi bar 'gyur ba dang / ji ltar mi'i
372b3(mdo sde): rgyal po de dag gis rang rang gi yul rnams su chos kyi sgron ma chen po 'bar bar bgyis shing / snang bar bgyis par 'gyur ba dang / ji ltar lha'i khang khyim thams cad lha dag dang
372b4(mdo sde): lha'i bu rnams kyis gang par 'gyur ba dang / ji ltar bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi dpung dang g.yog tu dbacas pa dang / gnod sbyin brgya stong phrag du ma dang
372b5(mdo sde): 'dzam bu'i gling na gnas pa'i lha'i tshogs thams cad tshim pa dang / rim gro bgyid par 'gyur ba dang / ji ltar bdag cag gi lha'i lus 'di dag gzi brjid
372b6(mdo sde): chen pos rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur ba dang / ji ltar bdag cag gi lus la brtson 'grus dang / stobs dang mthu chen po bskyed par 'gyur ba dang / ji ltar bdag cag gi lus
372b7(mdo sde): la gzi brjid dang dpal dang / phun sum tshogs pa rab tu 'jug par 'gyur ba dang / ji ltar 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad na lo legs shing nyams dga' la skye bo dang mis
372b8(mdo sde): gang bar 'gyur ba dang / ji ltar 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad na gnas pa'i sems can rnams bde bar 'gyur ba dang / dga' ba sna tshogs myong bar 'gyur ba dang / ji ltar
373a1(mdo sde): sems can thams cad bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du mar lha dang mi'i bde ba rgya che zhing / rgya che ba myong bar 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas bcom
373a2(mdo sde): ldan 'das rnams dang / lhan gcig gnas par 'gyur ba dang / ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba
373a3(mdo sde): de thams cad de lta na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dag bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis tshangs pa'i dbang po bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dag pas ches
373a4(mdo sde): 'phags pa'i thugs rje chen po'i stobs dang ldan pa'i/ byin gyis brlabs dang / brgya byin bye ba khrag khrig da brgya stong gi lha'i shes pa bas ches 'phags pa// de bzhin
373a5(mdo sde): gshegs pa'i mkhyen pa bla na med pa dang / drang srong mngon par shes pa lnga can rnam pa sna tshogs bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma thams cad pas ches 'phags pa'i
373a6(mdo sde): byin gyis brlabs kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/ sems can thams cad kyi don gyi slad du gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang
373a7(mdo sde): po'i rgyal po 'di 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bshad do// mi'i rgyal po'i dgos pa dang / rgyal po'i bstan bcos dang / rgyal po'i bgyi ba gang dag 'dzam bu'i
373a8(mdo sde): gling thams cad na mchis pa dang / gang dag gis sems can 'di dag thams cad bde bar 'gyur ba de dag thams cad bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
373b1(mdo sde): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/ gser 'od dam mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'dir nye bar bstan/ yongs su bstan/ yang dag par rab tu bshad do// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das rgyu de dang rkyen des
373b2(mdo sde): mi'i rgyal po des gdon mi 'tshal bar/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di gus par mnyan par bgyi/ gus par rim gro bgyi/ gus par mchod par bgyi'o// de skad ces
373b3(mdo sde): gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po chen po bzhi la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// de'i phyir rgyal po chen po khyed bzhi dpung dang g.yog tu bcas pas gdon mi za bar mi'i
373b4(mdo sde): rgyal po gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po rgyal po 'di nyan pa dang / rim gro byed pa dang / mchod pa byed pa de dag kun tu bsrung ba'i phyir spro ba cher gyis shig/ rgyal
373b5(mdo sde): po chen po dag dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen/ nam/ dge bsnyen ma mdo sde'i dbang po 'dzin pa de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa 'dzin du chug shig dang / de
373b6(mdo sde): ngag lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten 'di la sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa byed par 'gyur/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di rgya cher yang dag par rab tu 'chad
373b7(mdo sde): par 'gyur te/ rgyal po chen po khyod bzhis ji nas mdo sde'i dbang po 'dzin pa'i dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma bsrungs pa dang / gnod pa meng
373b8(mdo sde): pa dang / nad med pa dang / 'khrug pa med pa dang / sems bde bar 'gyur zhing / gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po 'di yang dag par rab tu ston par 'gyur ba dang / dge slong
374a1(mdo sde): dam dge slong ma 'am/ dge snyen nam// dge bsnyen ma mdo sde'i dbang po 'dzin pa de dag kun tu bsrung bar bya/ yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su gzung ba dang / yongs su
374a2(mdo sde): bskyang ba dang / chad pa spang ba dang / zhi ba dang bde legs su 'gyur bar bya'o// de nas rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu dang / rgyal po chen po yul 'khor srung dang / rgyal po chen po 'phags
374a3(mdo sde): skyes po dang / rgyal po chen po mig mi bzang stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa cig tu bgos nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der
374a4(mdo sde): logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ de'i tshe mngon sum nga du tshul dang 'thun pa'i tshig su bcad pa 'di dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod do// rgyal ba zla ba dri
374a5(mdo sde): ma med pa'i sku// rgyal ba nyi ma 'od zer stong gi 'od// rgyal/ ba pad+ma dri ma med pa'i spyan// rgyal ba me tog pad rtsa rdul me tshems// rgyal ba'i yon tan rgya mtsho lta bu ste// rin
374a6(mdo sde): po che ni du ma'i 'byung gnas gyur// rgyal ba rgya mtsho ye shes chu yis gang // ting 'dzin brgya phrag stong gis kun tu gang // rgyal ba'i zhabs ni 'khor lor bris pa ste// khor yug mu
374a7(mdo sde): khyud de bzhin rtsib ma stong // phyag dang zhabs ni dra bas spras pa ste// zhabs kyi dra ba dang pa'i dbang po bzhin// gser gyi ri bo lta bur rab tu gda'// rgyal ba dri med gser gyi ri dbang po// 
374a8(mdo sde): yon tan thams cad ri rab 'dra ba ste// sangs rgyas ri dbang rgyal la phyag 'tshalo// de bzhin gshegs pa'i zla ba chu zla 'dra// nam mkha' dang yang mtshungs shing 'dra ba ste// sgyu ma
374b1(mdo sde): smig rgyu lta bu chags med pa// rgyal ba dri ma med la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis// rgyal po chen po bzhi la tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa// stobs bcu dag gi gser
374b2(mdo sde): 'od dam pa yi// mdo sde'i dbang po rgyal po rab mchog 'di// 'jig rten skyong ba khyed cag rnams kyis ni// brtson 'grus rab tu brtan pas bskyang bar bya// mdo sde 'di ltar dkon mchog
374b3(mdo sde): zab mo 'di// sems can kun la bde ba sbyin byed pa// sems can rnams la phan dang bde ba'i phyir// 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir yun ring gnas par 'gyur// 'di ltar stong gsum
374b4(mdo sde): gyi ni stong chen gyi// 'jig rten dag na ngan song sdug bsnga la dang // sems can dmyal ba'i sems can rnam sa kyi ni// sdug bsngal thams cad zhi bar byed pa'o// 
374b5(mdo sde): gang dag 'dzam bu'i gling ni 'di na yang // 'dzam bu'i gling gnas rgyal po thams cad kyis// rab tu dga' ba chen po bskyed nas ni// chos rnams kyis ni
374b6(mdo sde): yul dag bskyang bar gyis// gang gis 'dzam bu'i gling 'di bde ba dang // shin tu lo legs nyams kyang dgar 'gyur zhing // 'dzam bu'i gling ni thams cad dag na yang // 
374b7(mdo sde): sems can thams cad bde bar 'gyur bar gyis// 'di na mi'i dbang po gang rnams ni// yul la dga' dang bdag bde dga' ba dang // rgyal srid rnam par 'byor la
374b8(mdo sde): dga' ba des// mdo sde'i dbang po 'di ni mnyan par bya// pha rol dgra ni yang dag zang byed pa// pha rol dag tshogs zlog pa dge byed pa// mchog tu 'jigs pas 'phongs
375a1(mdo sde): pa sel byed pa// mchog tu dge byed mdo sde'i dbang po 'di'o// ji ltar rin chen shing ljon rab mdzes pa// yon tan kun 'byung khyim na yod pa ltar/ 
375a2(mdo sde): rgyal po yon tan 'dod pa rnams kyis kyang // mdo sde'i dbang po mchog 'di de ltar blta// ji ltar chu drang skom pa sa la byed pa// tsha bas nyams thag tshe ni brnyed pa ltar// yon tan dag
375a3(mdo sde): gis skom pa'i rgyal po la// mdo sde'i dbang po'i mchog 'di de bzhin no// ji ltar rin chen thams cad 'byung ba'i gnas// rin chen snod ni lag mthil yod pa ltar// mi'i dbang po'i
375a4(mdo sde): tshogs la gser 'od mchog/ mdo sde'i dbang po mchog 'di de bzhin no// 'di ni lha'i tshogs kyis mngon mchod pa// mdo sde'i dbang po lha dbang phyug byas pa// 'jig rten
375a5(mdo sde): skyong ba rdzu 'phrul chen po pa// bzhi po dag gis kun tubasrungs pa yin// phyogs bcu dag na sangs rgyas// rnams kyis kyang // mdo sde'i dbang po 'di ni rtag tu
375a6(mdo sde): dgongs// mdo sde'i dbang po 'di ni bshad pa na// sangs rgyas rnams kyis legs shes brjod pa byin// gnod sbyin bye ba stong phrag brgya rnams kyis// phyogs bcu dag tu yul
375a7(mdo sde): yang bsrung bar byed// rab tu dga' zhing rab tu mgu sems kyis// mdo sde'i dbang po 'di ni mnyan par byed// 'dzam bu'i gling na gnas par 'gyur ba yi// lha'i tshogs rnams
375a8(mdo sde): bsam gyis mi khyab pa// lha tshogs de dag kun kyang rab dga' bas// mdo sde'i dbang po 'di ni nyan par byed// chos rnams mnyan par bya ba 'di yis ni// gzi brjid dang ni
375b1(mdo sde): stobs dang brtson 'grus dang // gzi brjid chen po yis ni lha'i lus// shin tu rgyas shing rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur// de nas rgyal po chen po bzhis/ bcom ldan 'das la
375b2(mdo sde): tshigs bcad pa 'di lta bu 'di dag thos pa dang / ngo mtshar du gyur/ rmad du byung bar gyur dga' bar gyur te/ de dag chos kyi shugs kyis yud tsam zhig ngus nas mchi ma phyis te/ de
375b3(mdo sde): ngag lus 'phar yan lag kun 'dar zhing dga' ba dang / bde ba dang / yid bde ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan par gyur nas/ yang bcom ldan 'das la lha'i me tog man d+ha ra ba
375b4(mdo sde): dag gis gtor mngon par gtor to// gtor mngon bar gtor nas kyang / stan las langs te/ gos phrag pa cig tu bgos nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga
375b5(mdo sde): sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de log/ sa su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan
375b6(mdo sde): 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi/ rgyal po chen po re re yang / gnod sbyin lnga brgya lnga brgya dang / chos smra ba de bsrung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba'i slad du/ rtag tu dge
375b7(mdo sde): slong chos smra ba'i slad bzhin 'brang bar bgyi'o// // gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las/ rgyal po chen po bzhi'i le'u zhes bya ba ste bdun pa'o// 
375b8(mdo sde): / de nas lha mo chen mo dbyangs can gyi gos phrag pa cig tu bgos te/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha ngas la btsugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das
376a1(mdo sde): ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das lha mo chen mo dbyangs
376a2(mdo sde): can bdag cag gis kyang / dge slong chos smra ba de'i tshig brgyan pa'i slad du/ spobs pa nye bar bsgrub par bgyi/ gzungs kyang stsal par bgyi/ nges pa'i tshig gi rjod pa
376a3(mdo sde): kun tu gzhag par bgyi/ dge slong chos smra ba de la ye shes kyi snang ba chen po bgyi/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di las/ tshig gam yi ge gang yang rung ba dag
376a4(mdo sde): cig yongs su nyams par gyur ta ma/ bskyud na bdag gis de dge slong chos smra ba de'i nges pa'i sgra dang / tshig dang yi ge de dag thams cad bsgrub par bgyi'o// ji ltar sangs
376a5(mdo sde): rgyas bcom ldan 'das brgya stong dag la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pa'i sems can de dag gi don gyi slad du/ gser 'od/ dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di 'dzam bu'i gling na
376a6(mdo sde): yun ring du gnas shing / myur du nub par mi 'gyur ba dang / sems can du ma dag gis gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di thos nas/ shes rab rno ba bsam gyis/ 
376a7(mdo sde): mi khyab par 'gyur ba dang / shes rab kyi phung po bsam gyis mi khyab pa thob par 'gyur ba dang / tshe 'di la tshe phun sum 'tshogs pa rab tu thob par 'gyur ba dang / srog
376a8(mdo sde): la phan gdags pa dang / bsod nams kyi phung po dpag tu ma mchis pa rab tu 'dzin par 'gyur ba dang thabs sna tshogs rab tu 'tshal bar 'gyur ba dang / bstan bcos/ 
376b1(mdo sde): thams cad la mkhas par 'gyur ba dang / bzo'i bgyi ba sna tshogs phun sum tshogs pa thob par 'gyur ba dang / bskrad pa ma mchis par bgyi ba'i slad du/ de la gzungs kyang stsal
376b2(mdo sde): bar bgyi'o// dge slong chos smra ba de dang / sems can chos nyan pa de dag gi don gyi slad du/ sngags dang sman dang ldan pa'i khrus kyi las brjod par bgyi ste/ gza' dang / rgyu skar
376b3(mdo sde): dang ra skye ba dang 'chi ba'i gnod pa dang / 'thab pa dang / rnyog pa dang / 'khrug glong dang / khrag khrug dang / rmi lam ngan pa dang / log 'dren gyi gnod pa thams cad dang / byang dang ro
376b4(mdo sde): langs thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur/ gang gis mkhas pa dag khrus bgyid du stsal ba'i sman dang / sngags ni 'di lta ste/ shu dag 'gri'u wang 'bu sug dang // sha
376b5(mdo sde): ma sha mi shi ri sha/ dbang po'i lag dang skal pa che// r+N+Na/ ma shing tsa a ka ru// shi be ta dang sra ci spos// gu gul ra sa sha lag gi/ rdo drag lo ma rgya spos dang // tsan
376b6(mdo sde): dan dang ni ldong ros dang // 'gi'u wang bcas ru rta dang // gur gum glas sgang yungs kar dang // spyi mong sug mel na la da// na ga ge sar u shi ra// 'di dag cha ni mnyam bgyis nas// 
376b7(mdo sde): skar ma rgyal la btags par bgyi// phye ma la ni sngags tshig 'di lan brgya mngon par gdab par bgyi// tad ya thA/ su kri te/ ka ma li na li/ dza na ka ra te/ ang ka rA Ta/ 
376b8(mdo sde): in dra dzA li/ shad kang te/ pa shad dre/ a par rta ka si ke/ na ku tra ku tra/ ka bi la/ ka bi la ma ti/ shI la ma ti/ san d+hi/ d+hu d+h+ya ma ba ti/ shi ri shi ri/ sad t+ya s+thi te swAhA/ 
377a1(mdo sde): lci bas dkyil 'khor bgyis nas ni// me tog sil ma dgram par bgyi'o// gser gyi snod dang dngul snod du// dang ra ba'i khu ba gzhag par bgyi// skyes
377a2(mdo sde): bu go cha bgos pa ni// bzhi zhig der yang bzhag par bgyi// rab tu brgyan pa'i bu mo bzhi// bum pa thogs pa bzhag par bgyi// gu gul rtag tu bdug par bgyi// sil snyan sna lnga bgyid du
377a3(mdo sde): stsal gdugs dang rgyal mtshan ba dan gyis// lha mo de ni legs par brgyan// bar bar dag tu me long gzhag/ mda' dang 'dud rtsi rna sbrel bzhag/ de nas mtshams kyang gcing par bgyis
377a4(mdo sde): de'i 'og tu dgos pa brtsam// sngags kyi las ni 'di dag dgis// mtshams gcad pa yang brtsam par bgyi// skad ya the dan/ a ra ke/ na ya na/ hi li/ mi le/ 
377a5(mdo sde): ge le khi khi le swA hA// bcom ldan 'das kyi snam logasu khrus bgyis nas/ sngags 'di zlas brjod bgyis nas khrus kyi zhi bar sbyor ro// tad ya thA/ sa ga De bi ga de/ 
377a6(mdo sde): bi ga tA ba ti swA hA// phyogs bzhi dag na gang gnas pa'i// rgyu skar dag gis tshe srungs shig/ btsas pa'i skar ma gnod pa dang // phung po las kyi 'jigs 'byung dang // 'byung po'i khams
377a7(mdo sde): rnams 'khrug bgyid pa// 'jigs pa mi bzang zhi gyur cig/ tad ya thA/ sa mabi ShA me swAhA/ sa ga re bi ga Da b+ha de swA hA// sa ga ra/ sa ma b+hu'u tA ya/ swA hA/ skan dA ma tA ya
377a8(mdo sde): sAhA / ranI la kan ShA ya/ swAhA/ a ba rA dzi ta b+hi rA ya/ sAhA/ hi ma ba ti sam b+huru tA ya/ swA hA/ a ni mi la bag tra ya swA hA/ na mo b+ha ga ba ta prah+ma Ne na ma/ sa ra sA t+ye de sid d+h+yan tu man
377b1(mdo sde): tra ba dA/ ta ra tu bi tsi/ tam prah+ma nu ma n+ya tu/ swA hA// dge slong chos smra ba de srung ba dang / chos mnyan pa de dag dang / yi ger 'dri ba de dag gi don gyi slad du/ khrus kyi las 'dis bdag nyid
377b2(mdo sde): der mchi bar bgyi'o// lha'i tshogs thams cad dang / lhan cig tu grong ngam/ grong khyer ram/ grong rdal lam/ gtsug lag khang der nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyi'o// ji ltar dge
377b3(mdo sde): slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'dzin pa de dag gi srog la phan gdags par 'gyur ba dang / 'khor ba las 'byung ba
377b4(mdo sde): 'thob par 'gyur ba dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba dang / myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
377b5(mdo sde): tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur bar gza'/ dang 'thab pa dang rnyog pa dang / btsas pa'i skar ma'i// gnod pa dang / rmi lam ngan pa dang log 'dren gyi
377b6(mdo sde): gnod pa thams cad dang byang dang / ro langs thams cad zhi bar bgyi'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha mo dbyangs can la/ lha me chen po dbyangs can khyod skye bo mang po la
377b7(mdo sde): phan pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba'i phyir zhugs te/ khyod kyis sngags dang / sman dang ldan pa'i tshig 'di 'dra ba bshad pa ni legs so// legs so zhes bya ba byin no// lha mo
377b8(mdo sde): dbyangs can gyis/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas phyogs cig tu 'dug go// de nas slob dpon lung ston pa bram ze ko'u din n+yas lha mo dbyangs can bkug go// 
378a1(mdo sde): lha mo chen mo dbyangs can mchod 'os bka' thub che// 'jig rten kun tu rnam grangs mchog sbyin yon che// rtser gnas mdzes ma dar b+ha rtsa yi gos bgos
378a2(mdo sde): pa dar b+ha rtsa yi gos gyon rkang pa gcig gi gnas// lha rnams thams cad lhags nas 'di skad tshig smras te// sems can rnams la dge ba'i tshig shong lde khrol cig/ sAd ya the dan/ mu
378a3(mdo sde): re tsi re/ a ba dze ba ti/ hing gu le/ ming gu le/ ming gu le/ ping ka la/ mung gu She/ ma rI tsi/ sra ma ti/ da Sha ma ti/ a gr-i ma grI/ ta ra/ tsi ta ra tsa ba ti/ tsi tsi ri/ shi rA mi rI/ mi rA
378a4(mdo sde): ts+yai du pra Na ye lo ka/ dza sh+le/ lo ka shri sh+le/ lo ka pri ye/ srid d+ha pra te/ b+h+ra ma/ ma khri shu tsi kha rI/ a pra ti ha ta/ a pra ti ha ta bud d+hi/ na mu tsi na ma hA mu tsi/ ma hA di bi/ 
378a5(mdo sde): pra ti grI h+Na/ na ma skar na/ bdag gi blo thogs pa med par gyur/ cig/ bstan bcos dang / tshigasu bcad pa'i rgyu dang / sde snod dang / snyan dngags la sogs pa la/ bdag gi rigs
378a6(mdo sde): sngags dngos grub du gyur cig/ tad ya thA/ ma hA prA b+ha bA/ hi li hi li/ mi li mi li/ bcom ldan 'das ma lha mo dbyangs can gyi mthus/ bdag rnam par rgyal bar gyur cig/ kA rA De/ ke yu re/ 
378a7(mdo sde): ke yu'u rA/ ba ti/ hi li mi li/ hi li mi li/ hi li hi li// sangs rgyas kyi bden pa dang / chos kyi bden pa dang / dge 'dun gyi bden pa dang / dbang po'i bden pa dang / chu lha'i bden pas/ lha mo
378a8(mdo sde): chen mo dgug pa bya'o// gang dag 'jig rten na bden par smra ba de dag gi bden pa dang / bden pa'i tshig gis lha mo chen mo dgug par bya'o// tad ya thA/ hi li hi li/ hi li mi li/ hi li mi li/ 
378b1(mdo sde): bdag rnam par rgyu bar gyur cig/ bcom ldan 'das lha mo dbyangs can la phyag 'tshal lo// bdag la gsang sngags kyi tshig rnams grub par gyur cig/ swA hA/ de nas slob dpon lung ston pa bram
378b2(mdo sde): ze ko'u din n+yas/ lha mo chen mo dbyangs can la tshigasu gcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par stod do// 'byung po'i tshogs rnams thams cad nga la nyan par gyis// lha dang dri za lha dbang bcas
378b3(mdo sde): ba'i 'jig rten na// bud med dam pa lha mo mchog gi rab gang yin// lha mo dam pa mchog tu mdzes pa'i zhal la bstod// yon tan rnam pa sna tshogs bsags pas yan lag brgyan/ 
378b4(mdo sde): dbyangs can zhes bya spyan ni yangs shing bsod nams 'bar// dri med ye shes yon tan rnams kyis rnam par brgyan// rin chen sna tshogs tha dad lta bu blta ba'i phyir/ 
378b5(mdo sde): mchog rab ngag gi yon tan khyad par de bstod do// dam pa mchog gi dngos grub byed pa dang // yang dag sngags dang yon tan byed pa dang // dri med mchog dang pad+ma 'bar
378b6(mdo sde): ba dang / mi mchog dang ni mig gi dam pa dang // dge ba'i gnas dang dge pa mthong ba dang // yon tan bsam du med pas brgyan pa dang // zla ba 'dra dang dri ma med 'od dang // ye shes 'byung
378b7(mdo sde): gnas dran pa dam pa dang // seng ge mchog dang mi la zhon pa dang // lag pa brgyad rnams kyis ni brgyan pa dang // zla ba nya ba lta bur snang ba'i zhal// yid du 'ong ba'i sha dang dbyangs snyan dang // 
378b8(mdo sde): shes rab zab mo dang ni ldan pa dang // dgos mchog sgrub byed sems can dam pa dang // lha dang lha min tshogs kun gnas brjod dang // 'byung ba'i tshogs kyis gnas rtag mchod
379a1(mdo sde): pa'i phyir swAhA// bdag cag lha mo 'di la phyag bya'o// bdag la yon tan khyad par klung stsol cig/ dgos pa kun tu bdag la dngos grub stsol// dgra rnams khrod na
379a2(mdo sde): bdag la rtag tu srungs// yi ge rdzogs shing tshig rgyas 'di dag ni// nang par langs nas gtsang mar brjod par bya// bsam pa dang ni nor 'bru thams cad rnyed// dngos grub dge ba rgya chen thob par
379a3(mdo sde): 'gyur/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las// dbyangs can gyi le'u zhes bya ste brgyad pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha mo chen mo
379a4(mdo sde): dpal gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ lha mo chen mo dpal bdag gis kyang / ji nas chos smra ba'i dge slong de yo byad thams cad phun sum tshogs
379a5(mdo sde): par 'gyur ba dang / bral 'phongs pa ma mchis pa thob par 'gyur ba dang / sems rtas par 'gyur ba dang / sems bde bar gdugs mtshan bas par 'gyur ba dang
379a6(mdo sde): gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di las tshig dang / yi ge rnam pa tha dad pa dag chub par 'gyur/ rnam par rtogs par 'gyur ba dang / yang dag par brjod par 'gyur ba
379a7(mdo sde): dang / sangs rgyas brgya stong dag la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pa'i sems can de dag gi don gyi slad du/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di 'dzam bu'i gling du gnas par
379a8(mdo sde): 'gyur zhing / myur du nub par mi 'gyur ba dang / sems can rnams kyang gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di nyan par 'gyur ba dang / bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya
379b1(mdo sde): stong phrag du mar/ lnga dang mi'i bde ba myong bar 'gyur ba dang / mu ge ma mchis par 'gyur ba dang / lo legs par 'gyur ba dang / sems can rnams kyang bde bar sbyar ba thams cad kyis bde
379b2(mdo sde): bar 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dang 'grogs par 'gyur ba dang / ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar
379b3(mdo sde): 'gyur ba dang / sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi sdug bsngal thams cad shin tu chad par 'gyur bar gang 'di gos dang / zas
379b4(mdo sde): dang mal cha dang / na ba'i gsos sman dang / yo byad dang / 'chog chas gzhan dag gis kyang / dge slong chos smra ba de spro bar bgyi'o// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
379b5(mdo sde): ba yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen me tog yon tan rgya mtsho bai DUr+ya dang / gser gyi ri kha dog bzang po gser du snang ba'i dpal zhes bya ba de la
379b6(mdo sde): lha mo chen mo dpal gyis dge ba'i rtsa ba skyed de/ des da ltar phyogs gang dang gang du sems pa dang / phyogs gang dang gang du blta ba dang / phyogs gang dang gang du 'gro ba'i phyogs de dang / 
379b7(mdo sde): der/ sems can bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma bde bar sbyar ba thams cad kyis bde bar 'gyur/ zas dang skom dang / nor dang 'bru dang / 'gron bu dang / gser dang / 
379b8(mdo sde): nor bu dang / mu tig dang / bai DUr+ya dang / dung dang man shel dang / byi ru dang dngul dang / sa le sbram dang / yo byad gzhan dag gis kyang / mi 'phongs par 'gyur/ sems can de
380a1(mdo sde): dag yo byad thams cad 'byor par 'gyur ro// lha mo chen mo dpal gyi mthus/ de bzhin gshegs pa de la mchod par bya/ spos dang me tog dang / bdug pa
380a2(mdo sde): yang dbul bar bya/ lha mo chen mo dpal gyi ming nas kyang lan gsum brjod cing / de la spos dang bdug pa dang / me tog kyang byin la/ ro sna tshogs kyang byin na/ de'i 'bru'i phung po chen po
380a3(mdo sde): rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur ro// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ sa la sa'i bcud dag rnam par 'phel// lha rnams rtag tu dga' bar 'gyur// 'bras bu lo tog ldum sdong ljon lha rnams// 
380a4(mdo sde): lo tog shin tu sna tshogs rnams kyang bskyed// gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po mo brjod pa'i sems can de dag la// lha mo chen mi dpal sems par 'gyur
380a5(mdo sde): de dag la dpal chen po byed par 'gyur ro// lha mo chen mo dpal ni lcang lo can gyi pho brang 'khor na bskyedamos tshal dam pa/ bsod nams kyi me tog 'od ces
380a6(mdo sde): bya ba na/ rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i khang pa dam pa gser gyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba na gnas te/ mi gang la la 'bru'i phung po spel bar 'dod pa des rang gi khyim phyag dar
380a7(mdo sde): legs par bya/ khrus legs par bya/ gos dkar po gtsang ma bgo bar bya/ gos dri rab tu zhim pa bgo bar bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
380a8(mdo sde): pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen me tog yon tan rgya mtsho ba DUR+Ya dang / gser gyi ri kha dog bzang po gser du snang ba'i dpal de la phyag 'tshal zhing / mtshan nas kyang lan gsum
380b1(mdo sde): brjod lha mo chen mo dpal gyi lag nas de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa byed/ me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos kyang 'bul/ ro bro ba sna tshogs kyang 'bul/ gser 'od dam pa
380b2(mdo sde): mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po'i ming yang lan gsum brjod/ bden pa'i tshig kyang brjod/ lha mo chen po dpal yang mchod cing / me tog dang bdug pa yang 'bul/ ro bro ba sna
380b3(mdo sde): tshogs kyang 'bul na/ gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di'i mthus de'i tshe/ lha mo chen mo dpal khyim de la sems par 'gyur/ de'i 'bru'i phung po yang rnam par
380b4(mdo sde): 'phel bar 'gyur ro// lha mo chen mo dpal 'gug par 'dod pa des/ rig pa'i gsang sngags 'di dag dran par bya'o// 'das pa dang ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i
380b5(mdo sde): sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshalo// sangs rgyasadang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// byams pa la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams
380b6(mdo sde): la phyag 'tshal lo// de dag la phyag 'tshal nas/ rig pa 'di dag la sbyor bar bya ste/ rigs sngags 'di bdag la 'byor par gyur cig/ sAd ya the dan/ pra ti bu'ur na ba re/ 
380b7(mdo sde): sa man ta dar sha ne/ ma hU bi hA ra ga ti/ sa man ta/ bi man ta/ ma hU kAr+ya pra ti/ prA ba ne/ sad tA aR+tha sa ma ta nu pra pu 'u re/ a yA na d+harma tA ma hi/ bi gi ni/ 
380b8(mdo sde): ma hA me tro ba sang hi te/ hi taM shrI sang gr-i hI te/ sa mar thA nu pA la naM// 'di dag ni spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i chos nyid kyi gsang sngags kyi tshig cig tu de kho na yang dag par grub pa
381a1(mdo sde): sbyin pa mi slu ba'i don gyi tshig ste/ sems can bar ma la spyod pa rnams/ dge ba'i rtsa ba kha na ma tho ba med pa dag gis lo bdun du 'don cing 'dzin pa dag yan lag
381a2(mdo sde): brgyad pa'i bsnyen par gnas pa la bsten ste/ bdag dang sems can kun thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir/ snga dro dang phyi dro sangs rgyas thams cad la
381a3(mdo sde): me tog dang spos rnams kyis mchod nas/ des bdag gi bsam pa 'di 'byor par gyur cig/ myur du 'byor par gyur cig/ gtsug lag khang ngam/ mgon pa'i gnas kyang rung ste/ khyim
381a4(mdo sde): de shin tu gtsang mar byas la lci bas dkyil 'khor byas te/ 8/ spos dang bdug pa yang dbul bar bya/ stan gtsang ma yang gding bar bya'o// sa la me tog gi sil ma bkram
381a5(mdo sde): nas bsdad par bya'o// de nas skad cig de nyid la dpal 'od / sa nas der gnas par 'gyur ro// de phyin cad khyim 'am/ grong ngam/ grong khyer ram/ grong rdal lam/ 
381a6(mdo sde): gtsug lag khang ngam/ dgon pa'i gnas su nam yang brel cing 'phongs pa med par byed do// mgron bu dang gser dang / rin po che dang / nor dang / 'bru dang / yo byad thams cad
381a7(mdo sde): 'byor pa dang / bde bar sbyor ba thams cad kyis bde bar 'gyur ro// dge ba'i rtsa ba gang dag byed pa de dag thams cad las lha mo chen mo dpal la shas kyi mchog sbyin par bya ste/ 
381a8(mdo sde): des na ji srid 'tsho ba'i bar du de ni gnas par 'gyur/ 'phang bar mi 'gyur/ de dag gi bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// / gser 'od dam pa
381b1(mdo sde): mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las dpal gyi le'u zhes bya ste dgu pa'o// / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen gtsug tor can la phyag
381b2(mdo sde): 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med par 'bar ba/ rin chen 'od zer snang ba'i tog la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa 'dzam bu gser gyi rgyal
381b3(mdo sde): mtshan gser du snang ba la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa gser du snang ba'i snying po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma brgya'i 'od zer snang ba'i snying po la
381b4(mdo sde): phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa gser dang rin dpo che'i 'byung gnas gdugs brtsegs la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa gser gyi me tog
